# Mantle of Faith
## Overview
**Aura** strong abjuration \[good]; **CL** 20th

**Slot** chest

**Price** 76,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This holy garment, worn over normal clothing, grants damage reduction 5/evil to the character wearing it.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]*

**Cost** 38,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 522
